text: The 2018 FINA Swimming World Cup was a series of seven three-day meets in seven different cities between September and November 2018. This edition integrated meets held in 25m-pool (short course) as well as meets in 50m-pool (long course). ==Meets== The 2018 World Cup consisted of the following seven meets, which were divided into three clusters. {| class=wikitable |- ! Cluster !! Meet !! Dates !! Location !! Venue !! Pool !!
